sn10.8:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati sītavane.
sn10.8:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati rājagahaṃ anuppatto hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
sn10.8:4.5: Tāvadeva ca pana bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo hoti.
sn10.8:4.8: Sve dānāhaṃ kālena bhagavantaṃ dassanāya gamissāmī”ti buddhagatāya satiyā nipajji.
sn10.8:4.9: Rattiyā sudaṃ tikkhattuṃ vuṭṭhāsi pabhātanti maññamāno.
sn10.8:4.10: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena sivathikadvāraṃ tenupasaṅkami.
sn10.8:4.12: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nagaramhā nikkhamantassa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn10.8:4.13: Atha kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi:
sn10.8:7.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṃ ahosi bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso, so paṭippassambhi.
sn10.8:7.2: Dutiyampi kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn10.8:7.3: Dutiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi:
sn10.8:10.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṃ ahosi bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso, so paṭippassambhi.
sn10.8:10.2: Tatiyampi kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn10.8:10.3: Tatiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi:
sn10.8:13.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṃ ahosi bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso, so paṭippassambhi.
sn10.8:13.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena sītavanaṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn10.8:14.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya abbhokāse caṅkamati.
sn10.8:14.2: Addasā kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn10.8:14.3: Disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
sn10.8:14.4: Nisajja kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
sn10.8:14.6: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati, nāmena maṃ bhagavā ālapatīti, haṭṭho udaggo tattheva bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn10.8:16.4: santiṃ pappuyya cetasā”ti.
